title: Introduction to The Rus
creator: Age Of Empires Official
description: The advantage of playing the Rus is that the wilderness is yours to command. By using your surroundings, particularly gathering resources, you can build up a strong economy quickly. In battle, the Rus are known for their mounted Warrior Monk that can buff surrounding units, and for the Streltsy, a powerful gunpowder unit.

youtube_data.title: Age of Empires IV - The Rus

title: Introduction to The Chinese
creator: Age Of Empires Official
description: The Chinese civilization is characterized by impressive constructions, gunpowder strength, and a dynasty system that provides unique benefits and varied strategies to overcome the opponent.

youtube_data.title: Age of Empires IV - The Chinese

title: Introduction to The Delhi Sultanate
creator: Age Of Empires Official
description: The Delhi Sultanate has a strong focus on research and defense, with an edge in technological advancement over other civilizations. Their army can be terrifying to encounter with the War Elephant, a melee unit of staggering raw strength capable of high damage, as the core of their army.

youtube_data.title: Age of Empires IV - The Delhi Sultanate

title: Introduction to The French
creator: Age Of Empires Official
description: The French civilization is known for their fierce Royal Knights, specialized gunpowder artillery, and economic bonuses. Constructing archery ranges and stables within the influence of French keeps, archers and Royal Knights can be trained using fewer resources.

youtube_data.title: Age of Empires IV - The French

title: Introduction to The English
creator: Age Of Empires Official
description: The English are a defensive powerhouse and resilient force on the battlefield, backed by a solid economy. Cheaper farms also increase food gathering rates, giving a boost to the economy early on. With early attacks, town centers fire more arrows than others and villagers can also fend off small raiding parties with bows and arrows.

youtube_data.title: Age of Empires IV - The English

title: iNcog's AoE4 Masterclass 1.2 - Basic Macro
creator: iNcog
description: This Masterclass focuses on the basics of proper economic management in AoE4. This is commonly referred to as "macro". We're looking to introduce this concept to beginner players for AoE4. The goal of this video is to show which considerations go into doing the following tasks: - Spending resources, - Villager production, - Housing... Essentially, you need to constantly shift your attention back to your economy. At no point in the game should your macro be neglected. You need to circle back to your economy on an ongoing basis. As demonstrated in this video, it can be a lot less APM intensive than it seems.

youtube_data.title: AoE4 Masterclass I.2 - Basic Macro
